entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 6:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -32.8°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: WSW 20 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 40%
